17g protein

Vegan Protein Cookies

100% plant-based protein cookies with 17g protein. Made with pea protein and flax eggs for a delicious vegan-friendly treat.

27
minutes
12
cookies
Medium
difficulty

Nutrition per cookies

160
cal
17g
protein
18g
carbs
6g
fat

Ingredients

  • oat flour 120g
  • vanilla pea protein powder 60g
  • baking soda 3g
  • salt 2g
  • flax eggs (14g ground flaxseed + 90ml water) 2g
  • almond butter 128g
  • maple syrup 80g
  • vanilla extract 5g
  • dairy-free chocolate chips 60g

Instructions

1

Mix ground flaxseed with water and let sit for 5 minutes until gel-like.

2

Preheat your oven to 350째F (175째C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

3

Whisk together oat flour, protein powder, baking soda, and salt.

4

Combine flax eggs, almond butter, maple syrup, and vanilla until smooth.

5

Add wet to dry and mix until combined. Fold in chocolate chips.

6

Scoop 12 portions onto baking sheet. Bake for 11-12 minutes until edges are golden.

7

Cool on baking sheet for 10 minutes before transferring.
